promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive mythical fox steel-type pokemon wearing a ancient crown. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or fox. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Sphinxynix, a a massive mythical fox steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Moon Press, Safety Check. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "fox", "steel" or "Sphinxynix". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, fox-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Ethereal as moonlight, this desert dweller uses Moon Press to shape sand into traps. Its Safety Check ensures no threat looms in its sandy kingdom.
